timeline.message: fix mysql ColumnDefinitionSegment,change type of dataType from String to DataTypeSegment
Filter out some tests for h2

timeline.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText: Hi, why did you want to limit to those databases?
timeline.author: tristaZero
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@
   -->
 
 <sql-cases>
-    <sql-case id="truncate_table" value="TRUNCATE TABLE t_log" />
+    <sql-case id="truncate_table" value="TRUNCATE TABLE t_log" db-types="MySQL,Oracle,PostgreSQL"/>

replies.bodyText: This testcase for H2 failed, so remove it. I just change mysql parser . I think this change will not affect others.
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: Why did H2 fail? AFAIK, when db is h2, parser test engine will use MySQL to parse SQL.
replies.author: tristaZero

+package org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.segment.generic;
+
+import lombok.Getter;
+import lombok.Setter;
+import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.segment.SQLSegment;
+
+import java.util.LinkedList;
+
+@Getter
+@Setter
+public final class DataTypeLengthSegment implements SQLSegment {
+    
+    private int startIndex;
+    
+    private int stopIndex;
+    
+    private int length;
+    
+    private LinkedList<Integer> lengthPair;

replies.bodyText: I think it is better as a whole. When using the whole length, users can use it according to their needs.
replies.author: jingshanglu

replies.bodyText: What I concerned about is that length and lengthPairwill confused user who considers length and lengthPair can have value at the same time. But the fact is that either length or lengthPairan' can have the value at one time. If the user calls getLength()andgetLengthPair()` together, what will happen?
replies.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: If just have one num,lengthPair is null, if have two, length is null.
replies.author: jingshanglu

timeline.bodyText:
As I do not think firstNumber and secondNumber are proper names, i dug into many doc, and found firstNumber is supposed to be precision; On the other hand, secondNumber means scale[1]. Can you give them other expressive names?
[1] https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/precision-math-decimal-characteristics.html
timeline.author: tristaZero
timeline.diffHunk:

+    
+    private int stopIndex;
+    
+    private int firstNumber;
+    
+    private int secondNumber;

timeline.message: change attr name of DataTypeLength from firstNumber secondNumber to precision scale

timeline.bodyText: Hi You should reverse those changes, for spaces is needed.
